description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，原中共中央总书记胡耀邦长子。
description.en: A political figure in the People's Republic of China, and the eldest son of Hu Yaobang, former General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一，曾任中共中央总书记。胡德平之父。
description.en: An early leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee. Father of Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平的前妻，原中组部部长安子文之女。
description.en: Former wife of Hu Deping and daughter of An Ziwen, former head of the CPC Organization Department.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中共中央组织部部长、中华人民共和国人事部部长，安黎之父。
description.en: Former head of the CPC Organization Department and Minister of Personnel of the People's Republic of China. Father of An Li.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平与安黎之女，胡耀邦的孙女。
description.en: Daughter of Hu Deping and An Li, granddaughter of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平的第二任妻子，中国光彩事业国际投资集团董事局主席。
description.en: Second wife of Hu Deping, Chairwoman of the Board of Directors of China Guangcai International Investment Group.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治家，与胡德平会面时任日本首相。
description.en: A Japanese politician who was the Prime Minister of Japan at the time of his meeting with Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 日本政治家，与胡德平会面时任内阁官房长官。
description.en: A Japanese politician who was the Chief Cabinet Secretary at the time of his meeting with Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖南省的县级市，是胡德平的出生地。
description.en: A county-level city in Hunan Province, China, and the birthplace of Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通称中国。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, commonly known as China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所综合性研究型大学，胡德平的母校。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Beijing, China, and the alma mater of Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主管统一战线工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China responsible for united front work.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高国家权力机关全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 全国人大内务司法委员会

zh-cn: 全国人大内务司法委员会

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中华全国工商业联合会

zh-cn: 中华全国工商业联合会
en: All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce

description.zh-cn: 中国工商界组成的人民团体和民间商会。
description.en: A people's organization and non-governmental chamber of commerce composed of people from the industrial and commercial circles in China.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的全国性组织。
description.en: The national organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the special committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国的国家级博物馆，后与中国革命博物馆合并为中国国家博物馆。
description.en: Formerly a national museum of China, later merged with the Museum of the Chinese Revolution to form the National Museum of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国文化和旅游部管理的国家局，负责文物和博物馆事业。
description.en: A state administration under the Ministry of Culture and Tourism of the People's Republic of China, responsible for cultural heritage and museums.

nodes.id: 中央整党指导工作委员会

zh-cn: 中央整党指导工作委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1983年至1987年整党期间设立的领导机构。
description.en: A leading body established by the Communist Party of China during the party consolidation period from 1983 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 由中国民营企业家发起成立的全国性非营利社会团体。
description.en: A national non-profit social organization initiated and established by Chinese private entrepreneurs.

description.zh-cn: 从事《红楼梦》及其作者曹雪芹研究的学术团体。
description.en: An academic society engaged in the study of 'Dream of the Red Chamber' and its author Cao Xueqin.

description.zh-cn: 由中华炎黄文化研究会主办的综合性纪实月刊。
description.en: A comprehensive documentary monthly magazine sponsored by the Chinese Yan Huang Culture Research Association.

nodes.id: 中国生物多样性保护与绿色发展基金会

zh-cn: 中国生物多样性保护与绿色发展基金会
en: China Biodiversity Conservation and Green Development Foundation

description.zh-cn: 中国一家致力于生物多样性保护和绿色发展的非营利组织。
description.en: A non-profit organization in China dedicated to biodiversity conservation and green development.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会组织部
en: Organization Department of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 负责中国共产党组织工作和干部工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department responsible for the organizational and personnel work of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国人事部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国人事部

description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务院负责人事管理工作的组成部门，后与劳动和社会保障部合并。
description.en: A former constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China responsible for personnel management, later merged with the Ministry of Labour and Social Security.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国剑桥的世界著名公立研究型大学。
description.en: A world-renowned public research university in Cambridge, United Kingdom.

description.zh-cn: 一家总部位于瑞士的跨国投资银行和金融服务公司。
description.en: A multinational investment bank and financial services company headquartered in Switzerland.

nodes.id: 中国光彩事业国际投资集团

zh-cn: 中国光彩事业国际投资集团

description.zh-cn: 由王豫颖担任董事局主席的投资集团。
description.en: An investment group chaired by Wang Yuying.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性慈善组织。
description.en: A national charitable organization in China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职位。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平是胡耀邦的长子。
description.en: Hu Deping is the eldest son of Hu Yaobang.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平与元配妻子安黎于2005年前离婚。
description.en: Hu Deping divorced his first wife, An Li, before 2005.

description.zh-cn: 胡德平在与安黎离婚后，与王豫颖结婚。
description.en: After divorcing An Li, Hu Deping married Wang Yuying.

description.zh-cn: 安黎是安子文的女儿。
description.en: An Li is the daughter of An Ziwen.

description.zh-cn: 胡知鸷是胡德平的女儿。
description.en: Hu Zhizhi is the daughter of Hu Deping.

description.zh-cn: 胡知鸷是安黎的女儿。
description.en: Hu Zhizhi is the daughter of An Li.

description.zh-cn: 1962年至1967年在北京大学历史系学习。
description.en: Studied in the Department of History at Peking University from 1962 to 1967.

position.zh-cn: 保管部保管员、保管部副主任、馆负责人
position.en: Custodian, Deputy Director of Custody Department, Head of the Museum

description.zh-cn: 在中国历史博物馆工作期间，担任国家文物局党委委员。
description.en: While working at the Museum of Chinese History, he served as a member of the Party Committee of the National Cultural Heritage Administration.

relationships.target: 中央整党指导工作委员会

position.zh-cn: 湖北巡视组巡视员、华北联络组副组长、西北联络组组长
position.en: Inspector of the Hubei Inspection Group, Deputy Head of the North China Liaison Group, Head of the Northwest Liaison Group
Secretary-General, Director of the Fifth Bureau

relationships.target: 中华全国工商业联合会

position.en: Deputy Secretary of the Party Leadership Group, Vice Chairman

relationships.target: 中华全国工商业联合会

position.en: Secretary of the Party Leadership Group

relationships.target: 中华全国工商业联合会
全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十届全国人大常委。
description.en: Served as a member of the Standing Committee of the 10th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人大内务司法委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十届全国人大内务司法委员会委员。
description.en: Served as a member of the Internal and Judicial Affairs Committee of the 10th National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会
中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会经济委员会

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月秘访日本期间，与时任首相安倍晋三会晤。
description.en: During a secret visit to Japan in April 2014, met with then-Prime Minister Shinzo Abe.

description.zh-cn: 2014年4月秘访日本期间，与时任官房长官菅义伟会晤。
description.en: During a secret visit to Japan in April 2014, met with then-Chief Cabinet Secretary Yoshihide Suga.

relationships.target: 中国生物多样性保护与绿色发展基金会

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国生物多样性保护与绿色发展基金会理事长，现为党委书记。
description.en: Formerly served as the Chairman of the China Biodiversity Conservation and Green Development Foundation, and is currently the Party Committee Secretary.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 曾担任中共中央总书记。
description.en: Formerly served as General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

position.en: Managing Director of Credit Suisse (Hong Kong) Limited

relationships.target: 中国光彩事业国际投资集团

position.en: Chairwoman of the Board of Directors

description.zh-cn: 王豫颖曾是中华慈善总会选出的美女慈善大使。
description.en: Wang Yuying was once selected as a beauty charity ambassador by the China Charity Federation.
